name: Call of Duty Endowment: Direct Action Pack
summary: Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Direct Action Pack Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.
